position: Actively looking for Software Engineer full-time roles / Machine Learning engineer roles |  MS Computer Science

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: • Engineered a robust machine learning algorithm for pipeline anomaly detection, leveraging Support Vector Machine techniques; delivered a solution that flagged anomalies 25% faster than previous methods, enhancing response times.• Attained a 95.93 % accuracy rate in a anomaly detection project by employing advanced machine learning algorithms.• Spearheaded collaboration with cross-functional teams to define system requirements, resulting in the design of a scalablesoftware architecture that expanded user capacity handling by 50% during peak traffic periods.• Spearheaded the design and development of an event website utilizing React JS and Node.js; optimized both front-endand back-end functionalities, resulting in over 3,000 user registrations and enhanced site performance.• Executed rigorous test protocols that improved software quality, resulting in a 40% reduction in post-release defects;managed critical data to streamline operations, ensuring departmental efficiency and continuous improvement.

projects: [{"title":"TriMet public transportation system route project","start_date":"Jan 2024","end_date":"Apr 2024","description":"Leveraged google Pub/Sub within the pipeline for real-time messaging, incorporating automated data validation and transformation stages to ensure seamless data flow and high-quality data ingestion into PostgreSQL.• Implemented a real-time data pipeline using the Pipeline Pattern to ingest and process over 50,000 GPS and stopevent records daily, resulting in a 40% improvement in data processing speed for public transit vehicles• Processed 1.5 million+ real-time GPS data points from TriMet vehicles using Python and PostgreSQL. Enhanced data storage efficiency with bulk insert functionality, reducing processing time by 60%.• Deployed GeoJSON and MapboxGL in the final stage of the pipeline to create advanced visualizations on interactivemaps"},{"title":"Anomaly detection machine learning model","start_date":"Jan 2023","end_date":"Aug 2023","description":"• Engineered a robust machine learning algorithm for pipeline anomaly detection, leveraging Support Vector Machine techniques; delivered a solution that flagged anomalies 25% faster than previous methods, enhancing response times.• Attained a 95.93 % accuracy rate in a anomaly detection project by employing advanced machine learning algorithms.• Spearheaded collaboration with cross-functional teams to define system requirements, resulting in the design of a scalablesoftware architecture that increased user capacity handling by 50% during peak traffic periods.• Spearheaded the design and development of an event website utilizing React JS and Node.js; optimized both front-endand back-end functionalities, resulting in over 3,000 user registrations and enhanced site performance.• Executed rigorous test protocols that enhanced software quality, resulting in a 40% reduction in post-release defects;managed critical data to streamline operations, ensuring departmental efficiency and continuous improvement."},{"title":"Multi-Vendor Restaurant Marketplace","description":"• Implemented a robust multi-vendor marketplace platform using Django and Bootstrap, ensuring a mobile-friendly webapplication. Deployed on an AWS EC2 instance for reliable hosting and seamless user experience.• Initiated location-based search and restaurant recommendations using Google Maps API. Optimized geography datastorage in PostgreSQL with PostGIS, enhancing performance and data integrity.• Engineered a tailored Django middleware solution to facilitate seamless account management; integrated real-time dataupdates using Ajax, resulting in a 30% improvement in application efficiency and user satisfaction scores.• Integrated PayPal for secure online transactions and refined CDTFA API to retrieve local tax rates, ensuring accurate"},{"title":"Shopping List App","description":"Designed a user-friendly shopping list app using React Native and Firebase to streamline list management• Established a complete CoreData architecture to optimize app data processing, resulting in 15% faster load times and abetter user journey, improving user retention.."},{"title":"Text Summarization","description":"Executed a user centric extension that consolidated feedback from 450+ users, creating concise summaries thatfacilitated data-driven decisions, ultimately increasing user retention rates by 10% over six months.• Streamlined a cutting-edge algorithm for textual information processing, achieving an 80% accuracy rate thisperformance led to a 50% increase in user satisfaction ratings based on feedback surveys."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Ranked 497 globally in TCS CodeVita Season 10
honors_and_awards.description: I secured a global rank of 129 in TCS CodeVita Season 10, a prestigious international coding competition. Competing against top programmers worldwide, I demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and algorithmic expertise, standing out among thousands of participants and showcasing my proficiency in coding and innovative thinking in a highly competitive environment.
